name: gun game thing
description:
How to play:
There are two players, each on the same keyboard. The goal for each player, is to kill the other player. Reloading is a little bit more manual than in other games. In this game, you need to take the magazine out with one key, then put a new one in with another key. The controls are listed below.

Controls:
Format: Player1/Player2
Move: ASD/JKL
Jump: W/I
Wall Jump: Hold (W/I) + Move Towards Wall
Shoot: C/N
Turn Around: V/B
Take Magazine Out: E/U
Put New Magazine In: X/M
Look Up: R/Y
Look Down: F/H

Speed Up/Slow Down Replay: Scroll Up or Scroll Down
